summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where the player character is standing in a dark, rocky environment facing a glowing red fissure or energy source in the distance. The character is equipped with a staff and appears to be prepared for combat or exploration. The user interface (UI) shows a health bar at the bottom left, along with several icons indicating abilities or items available to the player. On the right side of the screen, there is a display showing "Will x1200," which may represent a resource or currency in the game. The environment suggests a potentially hostile or mysterious area that the player needs to navigate.
